name: MyRPG Master
description: MyRPG is the software for the creation of your own role playing 3D worlds. It allows you to imagine and build your own play areas, your own GUI and your own adventures, without a single line of code. MyRPG is composed of many editors that meet all the needs of a role playing game creation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2GHz Processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any card with Shader v1.1 or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: All
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any card with Shader v2.0 or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: All
